title: Which BTS member from the vocal line writes the most and which songs did he write? - Quora

response.answer_text: These are the vocal line writing and producing credits. Source is Wiki and seems to be up to date with the recent MOS the Journey included. It doesn't break down between writing and producing though. If anyone knows how to search the Korea official song registration/credit list, that should give you a definitive answer. Jungkook: 14 (did not count the different mixes of Run). His producing for MOS Persona chorus for all non-rap tracks didn't get credited though. Per Hobi JK produced Jamais Vu. I thought I heard he produced all the chorus. It doesn't show up here. Jungkook - Wikipedia   Jimin’s: 7 Jimin (singer, born 1995) - Wikipedia  V: 13 (did not count the different versions of Run or if a song appears on multiple albums). V (singer) - Wikipedia   Jin: 8 Kim Seok-jin - Wikipedia  If this list is accurate, JK has the most at 14 and V closely behind at 13.

Based on Korea Music Copyright Association (KOMCA), vocal line with most writing credits would be V / Taehyung with 12 songs credit under his belt.  *Your Eyes Tell is not yet registered in KOMCA Songs written by Taehyung  Songs written by JIMIN  Songs written by JUNGKOOK  Songs written by JIN  BTS Vocal Line did not produced songs that much compared to BTS Rap Line but from all releases they have done much better than most average K-Pop idols. With the news of Taehyung’s mixtape, possibility of Jungkook’s mixtape, Jin’s new song and Jimin’s new song, their writing credit will eventually grow. Source : Korea Music Copyright Association (KOMCA) Searching Works | KOMCA
